about_the_game:
What is Plus?


Tailor Tales Plus adds a longer epilogue for each character that you buy the DLC of. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG of the love interest. Some characters have adult content throughout the story that was censored or removed in the normal version.

You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter on ALL characters. You no longer have to grind to continue reading the story.

Side Stories
Side stories are also unlocked in the Plus DLC per character. They can contain stories set in the future, past, present, or even set in the point of view of the love interest. Side stories are an on-going project and there will be more added in the future.

Tailor Tales Gray Plus
What does Gray Plus DLC contain?

  • A longer epilogue containing explicit adult content
  • Gray's 10th CG
  • Gray's 1st side story
  • Ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter

Please restart your game after installing the DLC to have it take effect.

content_descriptors.notes:
All Tailor Tales Plus DLC contains scenes of explicit sexual nature. Sex is described in detail and shown in graphical form. Genitals are clearly visible. These scenes are shown mostly in the epilogue of each character, but some characters have scenes throughout the story that are of sexual nature. To know which chapter contains adult material, look at the chapter selection of each character and find the chapters that say "Plus" under the number.

Every character in Plus is at least 20+ years of age. All sex is consensual and contains no violence. You can always review the trigger warnings at the start of each new character (chapter 1) to be safe.
